name: Onward!
description:
My entry for the Game Breaker's Toolkit Jam. Help this lonely ghost find his way. Good luck.

In all seriousness, this is a joke game. Lots of the rooms are meant to be unfair, and at least a couple are straight-up luck-based. It's for a contest that's about making bad games, so what do you want from me?

There's also a walkthrough available for download, if you need some help getting through specific rooms.
